items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater for multiple holidays
items.body: So cute! I ordered a medium but could have easily worn a small, I’ve worn it over thanksgiving tees and Christmas tees. Planning on Valentine styling later- the colors are bright and not dull at all. The sweater is so soft. Would buy in different colors. Read more
items.author: Gina W.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Happy with purchase.
items.body: Good fit. Not the best feeling fabric but happy overall with the purchase. Read more
items.author: Teresa Montgomery

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: Love this little sweater. Dress it up or down Read more
items.author: Heather

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely
items.body: This cardigan is adorable, comfortable, and very on trend. The striped pattern and tie front detail give it a cute, Y2K inspired look. The fabric is soft, warm, and has a good weight, making it perfect for fall layering. I love the v neck and long sleeves. It pairs well with both jeans and dresses, dressing up a simple outfit. The quality is good for the price and it has washed well. This cardigan adds a fun, stylish touch to my wardrobe. I've gotten several compliments whenever I wear it. Read more
items.author: Mia

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and stylish cardigan
items.body: This cardigan is really soft and has a cute, relaxed look when tied in the front. The stripes feel trendy without being too bold, and the red color looks great in person. The fabric has a comfortable stretch, but it is a little lighter than I expected for fall weather. I like the length because it pairs well with jeans or leggings. Overall it’s a stylish, lightweight layer that works well for casual outfits. Read more
items.author: Adam + Ashlee Kappel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing!
items.body: This cardigan from Cider is undeniably charming. The bow tie closures down the front give it a playful, vintage-inspired vibe, and the color palette makes it especially suited for holiday seasons like Christmas or Valentine’s Day. The thoughtful contrast in the knit pattern along the edges gives it a handmade feel that adds personality, even though it's clearly machine-made. While the design is a standout, the quality is more average. The fabric feels on the thinner side, and details like a visible loose thread at the hem make it clear that it’s a budget-friendly piece. It’s not something I’d expect to last for years of heavy wear, but it’s great for seasonal outfits or fun layering looks where you want to add a bit of flair without spending a lot. That said, the fit is true to size, and it’s comfortable enough for casual wear. If you're someone who changes up your wardrobe often or wants a cute statement piece for a few specific occasions, this is a good buy. For the price, the overall style-to-cost ratio is strong, especially considering how cute it looks in photos and in person. Read more
items.author: Ruman Reazulislam

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute cardigan.
items.body: This cute sweater is giving me Christmas vibes in Fall, this combination of color reminds me of christmas. This sweater is very comfortable to wear. My girl wore this over the top and it just looked amazing. It fits her perfectly, she is 5'2". This cardigan is not towards the heavy side but keeps you warm during the fall or windy season. The quality of this cardigan is great. She got a lot of compliments when she wore it for a night out. Read more
items.author: Aaditya

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s ok but boxy
items.body: This sweater looks cuter than it is. It runs large (like not just baggy it looks too big on) and is very boxy. I just didn’t love it and will probably return it. Read more
items.author: SeaTownGirl12

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Navy Blue, Carbon. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
